name: smartpdfreader
description: Chrome extension that can read a PDF opened in Chrome and extract clean text ``` smart-read-aloud/ │ ├── manifest.json ├── content.js          ← injected into PDF page ├── pdfjs/              ← PDF.js library │   ├── pdf.min.js │   └── pdf.worker.min.js ├── panel.html          ← (optional) text viewer ├── panel.js └── styles.css ```
author: Varun
